alert.note: Alert for Barren; Edmonson; Hart (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 5:25PM EDT until June 29 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Hart County in central Kentucky... Northeastern Barren County in south central Kentucky... East central Edmonson County in south central Kentucky... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 424 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Munfordville, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Glasgow, Horse Cave, Cave City, Park City, Eighty Eight, Coral Hill, Pritchardsville, Lecta, Goodnight, and Mammoth Cave. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
